content:
Typos in
FHIR-Genomics_v2/fhir/examples/codes for connecthon senarios/Scenario_1/sequence-example.xml

line 3
<id value="s1”>
should be
<id value="s1”/>

lines 43-44
<observation> <reference value="Observation/ob1”>

should be
<observation> <reference value="Observation/ob1”/> </observation>

if POSTing, then
- Patient must already exist, else remove the Patient element
- must not contain id (remove line 3)
